p: In medicine, many methods have been used to predict the value of a target variable, for example, logistic regression in dementia diagnosis [ 9], Bayesian network models to understand visual field deterioration [ 10], support vector machines (SVM) for cancer detection [ 11], and random forest analysis to predict FOLFOX (folinic acid, fluorouracil, and oxaliplatin) responders in colorectal cancer [ 12]. These new methods seem promising in many fields, but they have scarcely been explored in dosing regimen forecasting [ 13].
